Uses of Package
io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster

  • Packages that use io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.protocols.raft
    Provides classes and interfaces for managing Raft clients and servers.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster
    Provides interfaces for managing and interacting with the Raft cluster.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.protocol
    Provides RaftRequest and RaftResponse implementations for all internal Raft protocol communication.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.log.entry
    Provides RaftLogEntry implementations used internally to replicate state changes, sessions, and configuration changes in the cluster.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.system
    Provides classes and interfaces that aid in storing and loading persistent cluster and server configurations.
  • Classes in io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster used by io.atomix.protocols.raft 
    Class and Description
    RaftCluster
    Raft server cluster API.
    RaftMember
    Represents a member of a Raft cluster.
    RaftMember.Type
    Indicates how the member participates in voting and replication.
  • Classes in io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster used by io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster 
    Class and Description
    RaftClusterEvent.Type
    Raft cluster event type.
    RaftClusterEventListener
    Raft cluster event listener.
    RaftMember
    Represents a member of a Raft cluster.
    RaftMember.Type
    Indicates how the member participates in voting and replication.
  • Classes in io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster used by io.atomix.protocols.raft.protocol 
    Class and Description
    RaftMember
    Represents a member of a Raft cluster.
  • Classes in io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster used by io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.log.entry 
    Class and Description
    RaftMember
    Represents a member of a Raft cluster.
  • Classes in io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster used by io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.system 
    Class and Description
    RaftMember
    Represents a member of a Raft cluster.
